flavorText: The Ojutai believe in the Great Wheel: those who best serve the dragonlord are destined to be reborn as dragons.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Ojutai glauben an das Ewige Rad: Jene, die dem Drachenfürsten am besten dienen, sind dazu auserkoren, als Drachen wiedergeboren zu werden.
foreignData.name: Tanz der Himmelsweisen
foreignData.text: Bis zum Ende des Zuges wird eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, zu einer blauen (Drache, Illusion)-Kreatur mit Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft 4/4, verliert alle Fähigkeiten und erhält Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.flavorText: Los Ójutai creen en el Ciclo Dorado: aquellos que sirvan mejor al señor dragón están destinados a renacer como dragones.
foreignData.name: Danza sabioceleste
foreignData.text: Hasta el final del turno, la criatura objetivo que controlas se convierte en una Ilusión Dragón azul con fuerza y resistencia base de 4/4, pierde todas sus habilidades y gana la habilidad de volar.

foreignData.flavorText: Les Ojutaï croient au Grand cycle : ceux qui servent le mieux leur seigneur-dragon se réincarneront en dragons.
foreignData.name: Danse du sage céleste
foreignData.text: Jusqu'à la fin du tour, une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez devient un dragon et illusion bleu avec une force et une endurance de base de 4/4, perd toutes ses capacités et acquiert le vol.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli Ojutai credono nella Grande Ruota: coloro che servono con più zelo il signore dei draghi sono destinati a rinascere sotto forma di drago.
foreignData.name: Danza del Sapiente dei Cieli
foreignData.text: Fino alla fine del turno, una creatura bersaglio che controlli diventa un'Illusione Drago blu con forza e costituzione base 4/4, perde tutte le abilità e ha volare.

foreignData.flavorText: オジュタイの者たちは輪廻の大輪を信奉している。龍王に最も良く尽くした者は龍として生まれ変わる宿命にあると。
foreignData.name: 空智の踊り
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは基本のパワーとタフネスが４/４の青のドラゴン・イリュージョンになり、すべての能力を失い、飛行を得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 오주타이 부족은 환생을 믿는다. 용군주를 성실하게 섬긴 이는 다음 생에 용으로 태어난다고 한다.
foreignData.name: 창공의 현자의 춤
foreignData.text: 당신이 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 턴종료까지, 그 생물은 기본 공격력과 방어력이 4/4인 청색 환영 용이 되며 모든 능력을 잃고 비행을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os Ojutai acreditam na Grande Roda: aqueles que servem melhor o soberano dragão estão destinados a renascer como dragões.
foreignData.name: Dança do Sábio Celeste
foreignData.text: Até o final do turno, a criatura alvo que você controla se torna um Dragão Ilusão azul com 4/4 de poder e resistência básicos, perde todas as habilidades e ganha voar.

foreignData.flavorText: Оджутайцы верят в Великое Колесо: тем, кто верно служил владыке драконов, суждено переродиться драконами.
foreignData.name: Танец Небознатцев
foreignData.text: До конца хода целевое существо под вашим контролем становится синим Драконом Иллюзией с базовыми силой и выносливостью 4/4, теряет все способности и получает Полет.

foreignData.flavorText: 欧祝泰人坚信转生轮回确实存在：诚心侍奉龙王者来世必能转生为龙。
foreignData.name: 穹慧龙舞
foreignData.text: 直到回合结束，目标由你操控的生物成为基础力量和防御力为4/4的蓝色龙／虚影，失去所有异能，并获得飞行异能。

foreignData.flavorText: 歐祝泰人堅信轉生輪迴確實存在：誠心侍奉龍王者來世必能轉生為龍。
foreignData.name: 穹慧龍舞
foreignData.text: 直到回合結束，目標由你操控的生物成為基礎力量和防禦力為4/4的藍色龍／虛影，失去所有異能，並獲得飛行異能。

name: Dance of the Skywise
originalText: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a blue Dragon Illusion with base power and toughness 4/4, loses all abilities, and gains flying.

rulings.text: The target creature will lose all other colors and creature types and be blue, a Dragon, and an Illusion. It will retain any other types it may have had, such as artifact.

The target creature will lose any abilities it may have gained prior to Dance of the Skywise resolving. Notably, if the creature is a face-down creature with morph or megamorph, you can’t turn it face up, as it wouldn’t have a morph or megamorph cost when face up (because it’s lost all abilities other than flying).
After Dance of the Skywise resolves, the creature can gain abilities as normal.

Dance of the Skywise overrides all previous effects that set the creature’s power or toughness to specific values. However, effects that set its power or toughness to specific values that start to apply after Dance of the Skywise resolves will override this effect.

Effects that modify the power or toughness of the creature, such as the effects of Giant Growth or Hall of Triumph, will apply to it no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for counters that change the creature’s power or toughness (such as +1/+1 counters) and effects that switch its power and toughness.

text: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a blue Dragon Illusion with base power and toughness 4/4, loses all abilities, and gains flying.
